com.socialize.ui.animation

Class RotatingFadeViewAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socialize.ui.animation.RotatingFadeViewAnimator

  • public class RotatingFadeViewAnimator
extends Object
    Takes a collection of views and fades them in/out in a rotating sequence.

    Jason Polites
